Louise Parks (amụrụ n'afọ 1945) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
O nwèrè nzèrè Bachelor of Fine Arts site na Pratt Institute, na nzèrè Master of Fine Arts na Hunter College

A hụla ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu na nké onwé ya, gụnyere Afro-American Artists: New York na Boston na Museum of the National Center of Afro- American Artists na 1970. Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka ónyé nlekọta, ya na Milton Brown na-arụkọ ọrụ na ihe ngosi nkè ọrụ Jacob Lawrence na Whitney Museum of American Art na 1974.
